Package control

Class MovieFileManager

java.lang.Object
control.MovieFileManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
MovieManager, Serializable
public class MovieFileManager extends Object implements MovieManager, Serializable
The Class MovieFileManager. It manages movie files, allowing us to find movies via its ID and return. It allows us to update movies on their attributes, such as duration, showing status, synopsis, and so on. It allows us to display all movies and delete movies. It is the controller class for movies.
See Also:

    • createMovie

      public boolean createMovie(int movieID, String movieTitle, TypeOfMovie movieType, String language, int duration, ShowingStatus showingStatus, String synopsis, String director, ArrayList<String> cast, ArrayList<String> pastReviews, ArrayList<Integer> pastRatings)
      Creates the movie. reads the current list of movies if file exists gets movieList if there's an existing file, else initialise an empty ArrayList check for duplicates, return false if duplicates found creates a movie and append it to the list. sorts the movieList based on movieID. Then write the list to the file.
      Specified by:
      createMovie in interface MovieManager
      Parameters:
      movieID - the movie ID
      movieTitle - the movie title
      movieType - the movie type
      language - the language
      duration - the duration
      showingStatus - the showing status
      synopsis - the synopsis
      director - the director
      cast - the cast
      pastReviews - the past reviews
      pastRatings - the past ratings
      Returns:
      true, if successful

    • findMovie

      public Movie findMovie(int movieID)
      Finds movie from the set of all movies using its movieID, iterates through the list until it finds a movie with the same movieID. If found,break and return the movie. if list is empty/null, we will return null
      Specified by:
      findMovie in interface MovieManager
      Parameters:
      movieID - the movie ID
      Returns:
      the Movie

    • updateMovieID

      public boolean updateMovieID(int oldMovieID, int newMovieID)
      Reads movieList from file Check if MovieID to be updated/replace exists or not If it doesn't, return false Else, check if the new movieID to place the old one exists or not If yes, then there is a duplicate, and return false else, update the movieID and return true. Update movie ID.
      Specified by:
      updateMovieID in interface MovieManager
      Parameters:

      newMovieID - the new movie ID
      Returns:
      true, if successful

      public boolean updateMovieTitle(String oldMovieTitle, String newMovieTitle)
      Update movie title. Iterate through the list to look for the movie title to be updated If cannot be found, return false If found, update all the movie titles with this name to the new movie title, and return true
      Specified by:
